title: ROC崩溃
author: hahahaadouawgds
txt_content:

mod升级最新版本会崩溃，但旧版不会
为啥呢？
启动奔溃

replies.author: tnttu
replies.txt_content: 最简单的方法是把ROC内置手册的汉化删除

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:

hey 又见面了
Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not load XML at Resources/zh_CN/categories.xml relative to Reika.RotaryCraft.RotaryCraft

请将RotaryCraft mod发出来 我修复一下
